title: F*ck PES
content: Why the f*ck did you guys overbook??

comments.body: Fuck PES, all my homies hate PES

I applied for MCA at PES last year, and I cleared the interview round and all that, but then I got to know there was a waitlist, it was WL 11 at that time, but the wired thing is, when I withdrew from the admission process I get to know not a single person surrendered a confirmed seat, I had no choice but to apply again next year. 

So yeah, they overbook, and it sucks.
Shittiest college in Bangalore no cap.
Biggest welcome to PES moment in recent history
I joined the college in management quota aiml... My parents forced me... Idk what to do... Is pes a torture house

Wait what exactly happened ?
What does overbook even mean yo ?

Seats in aiml at rr : -36

Suppose seats are 300, these guys admitted 400 people in the first round 

So there are no seats left 

Basically, more admission than the number of seats
Adding to this, the admission could have been also provided to management quota requests, thus making the count *more negative*

Wrong choice of branch + questionable college + superfluous fees. 

All the best, you're going to need it.
What am I supposed to do now... Is there an escape?
Yes,drop year
What about the money I paid?

Yo brother

I have dmed you 

Reply
Why wrong branch?

He should have chosen cs , aiml is a kinda sketchy branch 

Tbh,  PES isnt worth the management fee or the PESSAT fee 

Ony take PES if you are getting thru kcet.
Ask them for a refund ..... 44L aint worth it man , you can do your education with the same amount of money in other foreign universities
As someone else said, shouldn't have picked AIML. There is a long explanation of this - check the FAQ post on this subreddit. The explanation is posted there
Ask for refund. Nothing here can justify the fees.

Boss

Take refund

If you invest 44 lacks, atleast you'll make some money than giving to pes

F*ck pes
i am getting Robotics and AI at BIT and CS-Data Science at RNSIT. Should I pick RNSIT?
i am getting Robotics and AI at BIT and CS-Data Science at RNSIT. Should I pick RNSIT?

Try to stick with CS is my recommendation , Although BIT is much better than RNSIT.

Do not freeze your choices now , wait until 2nd Round extended
yep thanks. Hopefully will get some CS branch in BIT
Any idea what's gonna happen to the 36 people ( do they have to give up their seats)?

Nah that would be shooting themselves in the foot. Their reputation will go further down.

They will most likely adjust their CET or diploma student quota.
they cant just change the cet quota right , which means they are just asking for someone to come and sue them .
Yeah, true. Honestly I really can't answer what PES is going to do from here but its a big mess

i think since a lot of people converted from pessat to kcet quota last year , lot of empty seats were left in ec campus , that is after people got called to join rr campus cse since seats were left there too.

ig to avoid all this again , they overbooked so it would balance out later . lmao they screwed up ig
hi hamish
Hey are u pursuing mca in Bangalore? I had some queries can I dm?
sure!!
hey, i have queries, can I dm you?
